Title: Road Trip: Beer Pong
Writer: Brad Riddell, Todd Phillips (motion picture "Road Trip"), Scot Armstrong (motion picture "Road Trip")
Actors: DJ Qualls, Mary Cobb, Rhoda Griffis, Preston Jones
Plot: Three college roommates join a bus full of gorgeous models and travel the country to compete in a National Beer Pong Championship. With a busload of attractive women who knows how much fun they could have?
